channel.title: [DSPK] Client crashes when I spawn Korasi Sword HELP! [DSPK]

item.title: [DSPK] Client crashes when I spawn Korasi Sword HELP! [DSPK]
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

So Iâ€™m using a DSPK client (PI source) and I added all the ints to itemdef_2.java, added the models to the raw folder in the cache and compiled, no errors.
When I spawn the item on the actual server my client crashes and I get an error.

First of all here are my ints for korasi sword.

case 13350: itemDef.name = "Korasi's sword"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Weild"; itemDef.modelID = 57784; itemDef.modelZoom = 1400; itemDef.modelRotationY = 700; itemDef.modelRotationX = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 25; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 60; itemDef.anInt165 = 57780; itemDef.anInt200 = 57780; itemDef.description = "The sword of a Void Knight.".getBytes(); break;

Any help is appreciated,

  • Mikey
